title: [Geyser Flats, Jungle's Edge]
description: A rock formation blocks travel to the south.  It is composed of striated layers that give it a sculpted appearance, with the wind as its creator.  To the south, the jungle quickly overtakes the brightly hued rock, led by creepers and vines taking the offensive with their snaky tendrils.
